record.titleTypeName: Slum Conditions, Rats, Trash, Fire Hazards
record.description: Family lives in a parked city bus that formerly served Chicago's Southside. Loomis Courts [a Chicago Housing Authority housing project] was built in this area in 1953.
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling. Photographer stamp, handwritten date and caption.
